extraction_metadata.notes: CRITICAL: BTC wallet address bc1qplq9m3hn2w4gqlcvm0vttpmd79dycuprkyf85w extracted. Notable: scammers attempted unauthorized bank transactions AFTER initial crypto theft - multi-stage fraud attempt. Bank successfully blocked these attempts. Bait-and-switch tactic: free marketing course → crypto trading.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Scammer messaged victim on Instagram, impersonating influencer they already followed
chain_of_thought.step_2_trust_building: Leveraged victim's existing follow/trust relationship with the real influencer
chain_of_thought.step_4_bait_and_switch: Link actually led to crypto trading site makerealscents.com
chain_of_thought.step_5_extraction: Convinced victim to send $300 in crypto to BTC wallet
chain_of_thought.step_6_secondary_attack: Attempted unauthorized bank transactions (blocked by bank)
